member.name: T:Emergent.Toolbench.UI.Help.WebSiteAction
member.summary: Abstract base class for "go to a web site" actions. Derived classes must implement .

member.name: M:Emergent.Toolbench.UI.Help.WebSiteAction.Execute(Emergent.Toolbench.Actions.ExecutionContext,Emergent.Toolbench.Actions.ExecutionStyle)
member.summary: Called when the action is invoked by Toolbench. Opens the web site in the user's default browser.

member.name: M:Emergent.Toolbench.UI.Help.WebSiteAction.GetWebAddress
member.summary: Determines which URL to visit when invoking the derived action class.

member.name: M:Emergent.Toolbench.UI.Help.AboutDialog.OnHyperlinkClicked(System.Object,System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)
member.summary: Event handler called when hyperlinks are activated.
